name: eandb.ca programming
body:
## Java Modular Image Synthesis Toolkit

 - [GitHub](http://github.com/bwkimmel/jmist)
 - [Home Page](http://jmist.eandb.ca)

JMIST is a research-oriented library for image synthesis.


## Java Distributed Computing Platform

 - [GitHub](http://github.com/bwkimmel/jdcp)

JDCP is an application for distributing long running, CPU-bound tasks across many computers.


## SECD Machine in x86 Assembly

 - [GitHub](http://github.com/bwkimmel/secd)

This project is an implementation of an [SECD machine](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SECD_machine)
in x86 assembly.  For details, please refer to:

> P. Henderson, "[Functional Programming: Application and Implementation](http://www.amazon.com/dp/0133315797)",
> Prentice Hall, 1980.


## Scala Units

 - [GitHub](http://github.com/bwkimmel/scala-units)

This is a class library for run-time interpretation, conversion, and analysis of units 
in [Scala](http://www.scala-lang.org).


## Java Utilities

 - [GitHub](http://github.com/bwkimmel/java-util)

This is a set of general purpose utility classes used by my my other projects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
